entries.text: The cat's tails twitch with a glitchy rhythm as Boots looks up at Boo G, eyes blinking out of sync. A sly grin creeps across the feline's face. Meow? The paths are many, but the cat always lands on its feet. Your luck may hold for now, but the cosmic game is ever-changing. This one's streak will not last.

I heard rumors about a newcomer. The one who refuses to stay dead.
The One speaks in riddles because the truth would break us.
Hey, you two, I know a shortcut that'll get us outta this mess. Follow me, or don't - your funeral. But trust me, I've been there, and this ain't the way you wanna go.
Guess you haven't been takin' the right

Alright, listen up Doc. I know a shortcut out of this mess, but you gotta keep up. These loaded dice rumors are just a distraction - the real danger's in the shadows, just waitin' to trip you up. Follow me, and keep your eyes peeled. Or don't. Your funeral.

Hey, One Eye, I hear ya. This place ain't for the faint of heart. But you know what they say - the quick survive. I know a shortcut outta here, if you're interested. Gotta keep those feet movin', am I right? Been there, wouldn't recommend it. But follow me, and I'll have you out of this noise in

Alright folks, listen up. I know a shortcut that'll get you to the other side of this sphere, but it ain't for the faint of heart. You wanna play it safe, be my guest - but if you want the quickest route, follow me. Or don't. Your funeral.
I watched them die. Then they just... came back. Like nothing happened.

Shortcuts, secret passages - they're all I see, friend. But this game you play, it's beyond my understanding. The sphere holds power, sure, but the path you walk, it's one I can't follow. Been there. Wouldn't recommend it.

Psh, that sphere ain't nothing special. I know a shortcut that'll take you right to the center, no dice needed. But it's a death trap, so you gotta have nerves of steel to make it through. Been there, wouldn't recommend it. Now, if you really wanna get the EXTREME rush, follow me - I know the quickest,
Now, let's move, before things get ugly. Follow me. Or don't. Your funeral.
Shortcuts? I got plenty. But you're talking about Ante 4 - that's big trouble, even for a veteran like me. Follow me, I know a way to avoid the heat. Or don't. Your funeral.
Been there. Wouldn't recommend it. Now, if you want the quickest way outta this mess, I know a shortcut. Follow me. Or don't. Your funeral.
I know a shortcut, Doc. But you're gonna have to keep up. Shortcuts ain't for the faint of heart. Follow me, or take your chances with the rest of these yahoos. Your call.

Alright, Boo-G, listen up. I know a shortcut that'll get us outta here quick, but you gotta keep up. Been there, done that - ain't no place for the faint of heart. Follow me, or take your chances. Your funeral.

Shortcuts? Psh, I live for 'em, my friend. 5's my lucky number, and I know every nook and cranny of this joint. Just follow my lead - I'll have us out of this mess quicker than you can roll the dice. Been there, done that. Your funeral if you don't trust me.

Ante 4, huh? Sounds like a wild ride. Lucky for you, I know a shortcut - been there, done that. Follow me, and I'll have us there quicker than you can roll the dice. Just keep those bootlaces tied tight.
Been there. Wouldn't recommend it. Just follow me, I know a shortcut that'll get you outta this mess.

Yo, Doc. You look like you could use a jolt. Lucky for you, I know the quickest way to the good stuff. Follow me - I'll show you a shortcut that'll have you feeling lighter than air. Been there, done that. Trust me, you won't want to miss this.
Lucky numbers aren't luck. They're fate. The dice know.
Been there. Wouldn't recommend it.

Relax, Boo-G. I know a shortcut outta here that'll have us far away from all this noise. Follow me, or don't - your funeral. These guys are all talk, anyway. Been there, done that. The quickest way is the only way I know.

I know a shortcut through the shadows - follow me, or don't. Either way, I'm not sticking around to see how this one ends. Been there, wouldn't recommend it. Just keep your head down and your dice ready - the quickest way out is the one you can't see. *fidgets with bootlaces and darts off*
